ActAppropriation Act No. 2, 1981-82
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT FONBERG of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Senior Advisor to the Privy Council Office, to be styled Special Advisor to the Clerk of the Privy Council and Secretary to the Cabinet, to hold office during pleasure, effective May 13, 2013.
